transforms.name: vite:load-fallback
vite:css
transforms.result: @import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Poppins:ital,wght@0,100;0,200;0,300;0,400;0,500;0,600;0,700;0,800;0,900;1,100;1,200;1,300;1,400;1,500;1,600;1,700;1,800;1,900&display=swap");*{box-sizing:border-box;margin:0;padding:0}.course{background:linear-gradient(#000,90%,#fff);font-family:Poppins;height:2000px;left:0;position:absolute;top:0;width:100%}.course .title1{color:#fff;font-size:48px;font-weight:600;height:48px;left:10%;letter-spacing:6px;position:absolute;top:550px;width:120px;z-index:2}.course .slider{height:100vh;position:relative;top:0}.course .slider .list .item{inset:0 0 0;opacity:0;overflow:hidden;position:absolute;transition:.5s}.course .slider .list .item img{height:100%;-o-object-fit:cover;object-fit:cover;width:100%}.course .slider .list .item:after{background-image:linear-gradient(0deg,#000 40%,transparent);bottom:0;content:"";height:100%;left:0;position:absolute;width:100%}.course .slider .list .item .content{color:#fff;left:10%;max-width:80%;position:absolute;top:20%;width:500px;z-index:1}.course .slider .list .item .content p:first-child{letter-spacing:10px;text-transform:uppercase}.course .slider .list .item .content h2{font-size:100px;margin:0}.course .slider .list .item.active{opacity:1;z-index:1}@keyframes showContent{to{filter:blur(0);opacity:1;transform:translateY(0)}}.course .slider .list .item.active h2,.course .slider .list .item.active p:first-child,.course .slider .list .item.active p:nth-child(3){animation:showContent .5s ease-in-out .7s 1 forwards;filter:blur(20px);opacity:0;transform:translateY(30px)}.course .slider .list .item.active h2{animation-delay:1s}.course .slider .list .item.active p:nth-child(3){animation-duration:1.3s}.course .arrows{left:45%;position:absolute;top:38%;z-index:1}.course .arrows button{background-color:#eee5;border:none;border-radius:5px;color:#eee;font-family:monospace;font-size:x-large;height:40px;transition:.5s;width:40px}.course .arrows button:hover{background-color:#eee;color:#000}.course .thumbnail{box-sizing:border-box;color:#fff;display:flex;gap:10px;height:250px;justify-content:center;overflow:auto;padding:0 50px;position:absolute;top:500px;width:100%;z-index:1}.course .thumbnail::-webkit-scrollbar{width:0}.course .thumbnail .item{filter:brightness(.5);flex-shrink:0;height:220px;transition:.5s;width:150px}.course .thumbnail .item img{border-radius:10px;height:100%;-o-object-fit:cover;object-fit:cover;width:100%}.course .thumbnail .item.active{filter:brightness(1.5)}.course .thumbnail .item .content{inset:auto 10px 10px 10px;position:absolute}@media screen and (max-width:678px){.thumbnail{justify-content:start}.slider .list .item .content h2{font-size:60px}.arrows{top:10%}}.course .title2{color:#fff;font-size:30px;font-weight:600;height:30px;left:5%;letter-spacing:2px;position:absolute;top:900px;width:200px}.course .nav{background:#222;border:none;border-radius:8px;display:flex;left:5%;list-style:none;padding:8px;position:absolute;top:980px}.course .nav a{border-radius:8px;color:#fff;font:500 16px Poppins;height:100%;padding:6px 23px;position:relative;text-decoration:none;transition:.5s}.course .nav a:hover{background:#5e5e5e}.course .container{align-items:flex-start;display:flex;flex-wrap:wrap;justify-content:left;left:51%;padding:0 50px;position:absolute;top:1050px;width:100%}.course .container .card{align-items:flex-start;background:#f3f3f3;border-radius:20px;box-shadow:0 35px 80px rgba(0,0,0,.15);display:flex;height:250px;justify-content:center;margin:50px 15px;position:relative;transition:.5s;width:300px}.course .container .card:hover{height:350px;margin:0 15px}.course .container .card .imgBx{background:#222;border-radius:12px;height:190px;overflow:hidden;position:absolute;top:20px;transition:.5s;width:250px}.course .container .card:hover .imgBx{box-shadow:0 15px 45px rgba(0,0,0,.2);scale:.75;top:-60px}.course .container .card .imgBx img{height:100%;left:0;-o-object-fit:cover;object-fit:cover;position:absolute;top:0;width:100%}.course .container .card .content{color:#000;height:30px;overflow:hidden;padding:0 30px;position:absolute;text-align:center;top:210px;transition:.5s;width:100%}.course .container .card:hover .content{height:250px;top:125px}.course .container .card .content h2{color:#000;font-size:1.5em;font-weight:700}.course .container .card .content p{color:#000}.course .container .card .content a{background:#000;border-radius:8px;color:#fff;display:inline-block;font-weight:500;padding:12px 25px;position:relative;text-decoration:none;top:12px}
